data.meanings: (Nun-Thal-Ra) to dedicate, make a vow, warn, admonish, caution, promise voluntarily, offer present. nadhiir - warner, one who informs and averts calamity, who cautions and put one on guard.

data.meanings: To meet, meet with, encounter, find, find out a thing, see, come across, experience, suffer from, occur, undergo, endure, lean upon, recieve, come face to face, go in the direction of or towards.This root has occurred in al quran in 45 forms, and been used about 145 times.

data.meanings: to become fat/bulky/corpulent/large. naqatun fai'jun - a fat and bulky she camel. faujun - collection of persons, party/troop/company/group/crowd/band/army, people to who fallow a leader, host.
data.sentence: The word فَوْجٌ comes from the root ف و ج and is associated with the meanings: to become fat/bulky/corpulent/large. naqatun fai'jun - a fat and bulky she camel. faujun - collection of persons, party/troop/company/group/crowd/band/army, people to who fallow a leader, host.
